summary: Implements a redesigned SignInScreen with a card-based premium layout, introduces a shared StartupLoadingScreen for initialization/profile-loading states, applies an orange/amber accent theme via CSS variables, and updates ProfileSetupDialog to be non-dismissible (outside click/escape) with improved copy and error UI. Some REQ-1 acceptance details cannot be confirmed due to truncation of ProfileSetupDialog changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Primary CTA is disabled until name is non-empty.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows `isNameValid` being computed, but the (truncated) Button/CTA markup is not visible, so there is no evidence the submit button is actually disabled based on name input.

missing_requirements.requirement: Submission shows an in-button loading state (existing pending behavior preserved).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not include the submit button rendering; therefore there is no evidence of an in-button loading spinner/text while `saveProfile` is pending.

missing_requirements.requirement: UI clearly indicates success by closing the dialog once the profile is saved.
missing_requirements.reason: Dialog is hard-coded `open={true}` and the portion that would react to a successful save (e.g., clearing state, calling close, or relying on parent unmount) is not shown in the truncated diff, so closure-on-success cannot be verified from provided evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Forces dark mode by adding `dark` class to `document.documentElement` on mount.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest asked for a coherent startup theme and explicitly avoiding blue/purple accents, but did not request forcing dark mode globally regardless of user/system preference.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduces `next-themes` ThemeProvider wrapping around App routes.
hallucinated_features.reason: The request did not explicitly ask to add theme-provider infrastructure; it only required consistent styling/theme across startup screens.
